item.description:
This month's speaker will be professional organizer Heidi Solomon, of POSH. I'm going to e-mail a quick bio. of her. I know that you'll be impressed! Meanwhile, check out her web site: http://www.posh-bosto...

I've heard Heidi speak, and I can attest that her talks are interactive and fun!

We will collect $2.00 to help cover the cost of snacks. Please bring your business cards for a raffle!

The last three meetings were informative and we all enjoyed getting to know each other. How about you? Want to join a lively discussion group?
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site.
item.why: You'll have the opportunity to meet career women like you who want to support each other. Every month, we'll have a different speaker who will present a topic of interest. Plus, there will be lots of time for socializing!
item.name: Women in Business Network May Meeting
